Headline: No trains between Ashland/63rd and Garfield
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Ashland/63rd and Garfield due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and Ashland/63rd due to track conditions.

As a result, trains are operating only between Harlem and Cottage Grove at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Garfield and Ashland/63rd to provide connecting service.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
